001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.homography;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Random;
006
007import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
008import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
016
017import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
018import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
020import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
021import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D;
022
023/**
024 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective)
025 * transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
026 * It works in two steps:
027 * First, an initial estimate of the homography is obtained with the
028 * "direct linear transform" method.
029 * Second, iterative, non-linear Levenberg-Marquart (LM) optimization is applied
030 * to find the final fit.
031 *
032 * @author WB
033 * @version 2020/05/19
034 */
035public class HomographyEstimator {
036
037        private static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
038        private static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
039
040        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
041        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
042
043        // ------------------------------------------------------------
044
045        public HomographyEstimator() {
046                this(true, true);
047        }
048
049        public HomographyEstimator(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
050                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
051                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
052        }
053
054        // ------------------------------------------------------------
055
056        /**
057         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets
058         * and returns a {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D} instance.
059         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
060         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
061         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
062         * @return the estimated homography (instance of type {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D})
063         */
064        public ProjectiveMapping2D getHomographyMapping(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
065                RealMatrix H = getHomography(P, Q);
066                return new ProjectiveMapping2D(H.getData());
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets.
071         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
072         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
073         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
074         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
075         */
076        public RealMatrix getHomography(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
077                if (P.length != Q.length) {
078                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("getHomography(): P and Q must be of same length");
079                }
080                int n = P.length;
081                
082                // input point sets are normalized (to zero mean, unit variance) if required:
083                RealMatrix Id = MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
084                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(P) : Id;
085                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(Q) : Id;  
086                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
087
088                // find an initial solution using the DLT
089                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < P.length; j++) {
090                        final double[] pA = MathUtil.transform(P[j].toDoubleArray(), Na);
091                        final double[] pB = MathUtil.transform(Q[j].toDoubleArray(), Nb);
092                        final double xA = pA[0];
093                        final double yA = pA[1];
094                        final double xB = pB[0];
095                        final double yB = pB[1];                        
096                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[] {xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
097                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[] {0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
098                        r = r + 2;
099                }
100
101                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
102                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
103
104                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
105                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] 
106                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
107                                 {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
108                                 {h[6], h[7], h[8]}} );
109
110                // de-normalize the homography
111                if (normalizePointCoordinates) {
112                        H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
113                }
114
115                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
116                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
117                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
118                }
119                else {
120                        throw new RuntimeException("estimateHomography(): H could not be normalized");
121                }
122
123                // refine the solution using non-linear optimization if required
124                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, P, Q) : H;
125        }
126
127        /**
128         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and
129         * multiple observations (image point sets).
130         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
131         * TODO: This should not be here.
132         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
133         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
134         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
135         * @deprecated
136         */
137        public RealMatrix[] getHomographies(Pnt2d[] modelPts, Pnt2d[][] obsPoints) {
138                final int M = obsPoints.length;
139                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
140                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
141                        homographies[i] = getHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
142                }
143                return homographies;
144        }
145
146        /**
147         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
148         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
149         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
150         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
151         * @return the refined homography matrix
152         */
153        private static RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
154                final int M = pntsA.length;             
155                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
156                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
157                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
158                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
159                }                       
160                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
161                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
162
163                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
164                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
165                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed), 
166                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit), 
167                                // TODO: add weight matrix (diagonal)?
168                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker -- do we need one?
169                                MaxLmEvaluations, 
170                                MaxLmIterations);
171
172                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
173                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
174
175                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
176                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
177                int iterations = result.getIterations();
178                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
179                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
180                }
181                //System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
182                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
183        }
184
185
186        private static MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(Pnt2d[] X) {
187                //System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
188                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
189                        
190                        @Override
191                        public double[] value(double[] h) {                     
192                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
193                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
194                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
195                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
196                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
197                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
198                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
199                                }
200                                return Y;
201                        }
202                };
203        }
204
205        private static MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(Pnt2d[] X) {
206                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
207                        
208                        @Override
209                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
210                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
211                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
212                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
213                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
214
215                                        final double w  = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
216                                        final double w2 = w * w;
217
218                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];           
219                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[] {x/w, y/w, 1/w, 0, 0, 0, -sx*x/w2, -sx*y/w2, -sx/w2};
220
221                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
222                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[] {0, 0, 0, x/w, y/w, 1/w, -sy*x/w2, -sy*y/w2, -sy/w2};
223                                }
224                                return J;
225                        }
226                };
227        }
228

321
322        // TESTING --------------------------------------------------------
323
324        static double NOISE = 0.1;
325
326        private static Pnt2d mapPoint(RealMatrix H, Pnt2d p) {
327                double[] xa = p.toDoubleArray(); // {p.getX(), p.getY()};
328                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
329                return PntDouble.from(xb);
330        }
331
332        private static Random rand = new Random();
333
334        private static Pnt2d mapPointWithNoise(RealMatrix H, Pnt2d p, double noise) {
335                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
336                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
337                double xn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
338                double yn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
339                return PntDouble.from(xb[0] + xn, xb[1] + yn);
340        }
341
342        /**
343         * Used for testing only.
344         * @param args ignored
345         */
346        public static void main(String[] args) {
347                RealMatrix Hreal = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
348                                {{3, 2, -1},
349                        {5, 0, 2},
350                        {4, 4, 9}});
351
352                System.out.println("H (real) = ");
353                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.scalarMultiply(1/Hreal.getEntry(2, 2)).getData()));
354                //              System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.getData()));
355
356                List<Pnt2d> pntlistA = new ArrayList<Pnt2d>();
357                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(10, 7));
358                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(3, -1));
359                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(5, 5));
360                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(-6, 13));
361                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(0, 1));
362                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(2, 3));
363
364                List<Pnt2d> pntlistB = new ArrayList<Pnt2d>();
365                for (Pnt2d a : pntlistA) {
366                        pntlistB.add(mapPointWithNoise(Hreal, a, NOISE));
367                }
368
369                Pnt2d[] pntsA = pntlistA.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
370                Pnt2d[] pntsB = pntlistB.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
371
372
373                System.out.println("\nPoint correspondences:");
374                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
375                        Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
376                        Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
377                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f)\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), b.getX(), b.getY());
378                }
379                System.out.println();
380
381                System.out.println("\n*************** WITHOUT NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
382                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, false), pntsA, pntsB);
383
384                System.out.println("\n*************** WITH NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
385                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, true), pntsA, pntsB);
386
387                System.out.println("\n*************** USING LEAST-SQUARES MAPPING *****************");
388                runTestLeastSquares(pntsA, pntsB);
389
390                System.out.println("\n*************** GENERATE A MAPPING *****************");
391                ProjectiveMapping2D pm = new HomographyEstimator().getHomographyMapping(pntsA, pntsB);
392                System.out.println("projective mapping = \n" + pm.toString());
393
394        }
395
396        private static void runTestDLT(HomographyEstimator he, Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
397                RealMatrix Hest = he.getHomography(pntsA, pntsB);
398
399                System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
400                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
401
402                Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
403                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
404                        pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
405                }
406
407                System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
408                double sumDist2 = 0;
409                double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
410                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
411                        Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
412                        Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
413                        Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
414                        double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
415                        sumDist2 += dist2;
416                        maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
417                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
418                }
419                System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
420                System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
421        }
422
423        private static void runTestLeastSquares(Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
424                ProjectiveMapping2D mapping = ProjectiveMapping2D.fromPoints(pntsA, pntsB);
425                double[][] Hmap = mapping.getTransformationMatrix();
426                System.out.println("H (mapping) = "); 
427                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hmap));
428                {
429                        Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
430                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
431                                pntsC[i] = //(Pnt2d) 
432                                        mapping.applyTo(PntDouble.from(pntsA[i]));
433//                                      mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.PntDouble.from(pntsA[i].getX(), pntsA[i].getY()));
434                        }
435
436                        System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
437                        double sumDist2 = 0;
438                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
439                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
440                                Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
441                                Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
442                                Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
443                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
444                                sumDist2 += dist2;
445                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
446                                System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
447                        }
448                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
449                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));
450                }
451                {
452                        System.out.println("   +++ running refinement ++++");
453                        RealMatrix Hinit = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Hmap);
454                        RealMatrix Hest = refineHomography(Hinit, pntsA, pntsB);
455                        System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
456                        System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
457
458                        Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
459                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
460                                pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
461                        }
462
463                        //                      System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
464                        double sumDist2 = 0;
465                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
466                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
467                                @SuppressWarnings("unused")
468                                Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
469                                Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
470                                Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
471                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
472                                sumDist2 += dist2;
473                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
474                                //                              System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
475                        }
476                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
477                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
478                }
479        }
480
481}
